Author: tylerjosephsbitch
Text: I have been both in your position and on the opposite side as well. one of my classmates had an ed and seeing her gain weight was honestly a relief to all of us. we never saw her as anything less, much less gossiped or talked about it. she looked so much more vibrant, happy and healthy and honestly? just LIVING. we didn’t have to constantly worry for her anymore.  all I can say is that I doubt any one would be such dicks to discuss about someone else’s weight as a convo topic with their friends. if they do, well... to hell with them! everyone else can see that you’re finally doing better and i promise you they will be SO relieved and SO happy for you.
